name: Böcük
description:
Game created for Game Off 2021. The theme is "BUG".

Github Repository Link: https://github.com/kocak17/bocuk

Move around with WASD and Arrow Keys

Interact objects and NPCs with E

Proceed dialog by clicking the "CONTINUE >>" button

Deniz Koçak - Game Developer

Mücahit Morcol - Game Artist

Uğur Önal - Game Designer

Yağmur Öcal - Composer
